text: @realDonaldTrump 96% approval in the Republican Party - but the republican party does not make up the majority of the voting base. The rest of us want you gone. We are leading the WORLD in coronavirus cases and deaths because you dropped the ball and have made a mess of this. You blew it.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
